column1: harold doust| harold doust. died: june 12
column6: 2015 at licking memorial hospital. born in columbus
column7: oh to the late donald and mary doust. harold was an u. s. army veteran; longtime member of the iof and an active participant of the libbencon clowns where he was known as ""herkie the clown;"" member of hilliard presbyterian church; retired from western electric as an installer and from riverside methodist hospital as a shuttle driver; volunteer with the kobacker house hospice. also preceded by loving wife of 60 years
column9: aunt gladys sayre. survived by children
column11: elaine hoyer and brenda (dan) hickman; grandchildren
column23: jack and carol walker; numerous nieces
column24: nephews and many other friends. friends may call tuesday
column26: 2015 from 2-4 and 6-8 p. m. at the tidd family funeral home
column28: oh. funeral service will be wednesday
column32: at 10 a. m. rev. bob armstrong officiating. entombment forest lawn cemetery. memorial contributions may be made to ohio. health hospice
